video.title: The Boondocks
video.synopsis: This satirical series follows the socially conscious misadventures of Huey Freeman, a smart 10-year-old who relocates from Chicago to the suburbs.

episodes.synopsis: Granddad sets out to use a wealthy and influential neighbor's garden party to teach the boys how to deal with the white power structure.
episodes.title: The Garden Party

episodes.synopsis: Huey and Riley find themselves on opposite sides in the sex crimes trial of R&B singer R. Kelly.
episodes.title: The Trial of Robert Kelly

episodes.synopsis: Riley and Huey team up to convince Granddad that his new girlfriend is actually a prostitute.
episodes.title: Guess Hoe's Coming to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Humiliated after being beaten up by an elderly blind man, Granddad looks to set the record straight with a rematch.
episodes.title: Granddad's Fight

episodes.synopsis: When Tom is falsely accused of murder, it's up to Riley and Huey to help keep him from going to jail.
episodes.title: A Date with the Health Inspector

episodes.synopsis: The shooting of a rap music star sends Riley to the hospital to protect him.
episodes.title: The Story of Gangstalicious

episodes.synopsis: As Riley seeks revenge on Santa Claus, Huey is recruited to direct the school's annual Christmas play.
episodes.title: A Huey Freeman Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Riley convinces Granddad to go along with a lie in order to appear on the TV show "Pimp My Ride."
episodes.title: The Real

episodes.synopsis: Huey dreams about the return of civil rights leader Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
episodes.title: Return of the King

episodes.synopsis: The Freeman family's wealthy neighbor offers to set Granddad up with his own soul food restaurant.
episodes.title: The Itis

episodes.synopsis: Huey has to stop Riley and a small gang of misfit idiots from nabbing talk show deity Oprah.
episodes.title: Let's Nab Oprah

episodes.synopsis: As Riley gets a mentor for his graffiti art, Huey explores the effects of watching too much black television.
episodes.title: Riley Wuz Here

episodes.synopsis: The Freemans head back to Chicago so Granddad can deliver the eulogy at the funeral of an old friend.
episodes.title: Wingmen

episodes.synopsis: After a heat wave inspires her to open a lemonade stand to earn enough money for a pony, Jazmine gets in too deep with a ruthless local businessman.
episodes.title: The Block Is Hot

episodes.synopsis: A tumor has Uncle Ruckus convinced that only whites can go to heaven; Huey sets out to stop the execution of a man who was wrongly accused of murder.
episodes.title: The Passion of Reverend Ruckus

episodes.synopsis: When Granddad sneaks the boys and Jazmine into the latest Soul Plane movie, Huey sabotages the film and Uncle Ruckus tries to get them all arrested.
episodes.title: ...Or Die Trying

episodes.synopsis: Tom thinks his wife is about to leave him for R&B star Usher, so the Freemans hire a pimp to teach him how to handle his woman.
episodes.title: Tom, Sarah, and Usher

episodes.synopsis: As a crime wave hits Woodcrest, Riley refuses to snitch on the crooks who stole Granddad's beloved car.
episodes.title: Thank You for Not Snitching

episodes.synopsis: Granddad and the boys summon Uncle Ruckus to perform an exorcism after the ghost of Col. Stinkmeaner returns from hell to possess Tom.
episodes.title: Stinkmeaner Strikes Back

episodes.synopsis: When rap star Thugnificent buys a house on Timid Deer Lane, his loud parties and annoying behavior goad Granddad into starting a world-class feud.
episodes.title: The Story of Thugnificent

episodes.synopsis: After a series of online dating failures, Granddad lands a promising date for the weekend, only to learn that she's a deadly martial arts master.
episodes.title: Attack of the Killer Kung-Fu Wolf-Bitch

episodes.synopsis: Riley joins Thugnificent's Lethal Injection Crew, but he's forced to prove himself worthy when a neighborhood bully steals his jeweled chain.
episodes.title: Shinin'

episodes.synopsis: When Tom's youth league team offers Riley a chance at his dream of basketball superstardom, he soon learns the importance of being a team player.
episodes.title: Ballin'!

episodes.synopsis: Displaced by Hurricane Katrina, Granddad's cousin Jericho and his family seek refuge with the Freemans.
episodes.title: Invasion of the Katrinians

episodes.synopsis: When Granddad takes a vacation and the boys quickly drive off their babysitter, Huey steps up to take charge.
episodes.title: Home Alone

episodes.synopsis: When Riley's third grade teacher uses the "N-word" during an argument, Granddad involves Rev. Rollo Goodlove in a fight to make the school board pay.
episodes.title: The S-Word

episodes.synopsis: Granddad, Uncle Ruckus and Huey present three very different accounts of the life story of family legend Catcher Freeman.
episodes.title: The Story of Catcher Freeman

episodes.synopsis: News that Gangstalicious is gay sends Riley deep into denial, even as he mimics many of the rapper's seemingly homosexual characteristics.
episodes.title: The Story of Gangstalicious

episodes.synopsis: A German documentary follows the Freeman family from the election to the inauguration of America's first black president.
episodes.title: It's a Black President, Huey Freeman

episodes.synopsis: When his new album tanks and the IRS comes calling, Otis faces the horror of getting a real job and takes desperate measures to stay afloat.
episodes.title: Bitches to Rags

episodes.synopsis: Ed Wuncler is forced to gamble all of Woodcrest's economic fortunes on a kickball game with the town's sister city: Wushung, China.
episodes.title: The Red Ball

episodes.synopsis: Col. H. Stinkmeaner had no family and no friends, but he did have a mean crew, three of whom are in town to exact revenge on the Freeman family.
episodes.title: Stinkmeaner 3: The Hateocracy

episodes.synopsis: If it's fun to do bad things, then Riley is having the best time ever with juvenile felon Lamilton Taeshawn, who soon ups the ante.
episodes.title: Smokin' with Cigarettes

episodes.synopsis: Riley takes over the school candy-bar hustle and floods the block with sugar, leading to an all-out war for control of the chocolate-covered streets.
episodes.title: The Fund-Raiser

episodes.synopsis: Having conquered his fear of prison rape, Tom leads Huey, Riley and some classmates on a trip to jail as part of a Scared Stiff program.
episodes.title: A Date with the Booty Warrior

episodes.synopsis: A new handyman is undercutting Uncle Ruckus, which is good for Granddad and his garden until the man claims to be his long-lost son, Lando.
episodes.title: The Story of Lando Freeman

episodes.synopsis: Granddad finds beautiful Ebony Brown perfect in every way. Is this the end of his long, desperate search for a woman? Not if he can help it.
episodes.title: The Lovely Ebony Brown

episodes.synopsis: After a health scare, Granddad discovers the amazing life benefits of medical marijuana and suddenly becomes a balanced, well-adjusted person.
episodes.title: Mr. Medicinal

episodes.synopsis: When a poultry-borne virus erupts during a fast-food promotion, society spins out of control faster than you can say "white meat only."
episodes.title: The Fried Chicken Flu

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Ruckus's family comes to town, and Ruckus must settle some old business with his father.
episodes.title: The Color Ruckus

episodes.synopsis: A terror attack near Woodcrest is imminent, and domestic terrorist Huey Freeman is the prime suspect.
episodes.title: It's Goin' Down

episodes.synopsis: Pretty Boy Flizzy is arrested for armed robbery and exchanges relationship advice for a lawyer.
episodes.title: Pretty Boy Flizzy

episodes.synopsis: Granddad owes millions of dollars on his house to Eddie Wuncler (son of Ed Wuncler), who has some unique ideas about how Granddad can pay him back.
episodes.title: Good Times

episodes.synopsis: It may not be meth, but the explosive hair product the Freemans are selling is just as dangerous. Boss Willona runs a black market hair-care industry.
episodes.title: Breaking Granddad

episodes.synopsis: Granddad is hired by pimps at a nursing home to escort lonely ladies, but he learns that the job is not as sexy as it sounds.
episodes.title: Early Bird Special

episodes.synopsis: A young, reluctant Granddad is held as an unwilling freedom rider by Rev. Sturdy Harris on a dangerous trip through the racist South.
episodes.title: Freedom Ride Or Die

episodes.synopsis: Granddad co-stars on a reality show when he begins dating Kardashia, a long-lost Kardashian sister. Can the Freemans keep up with Kardashia?
episodes.title: Granddad Dates a Kardashian

episodes.synopsis: The Freemans find that Eddie Wuncler's new slavery theme park may be a bit too authentic when they are trapped there and forced to be slaves.
episodes.title: Freedomland

episodes.synopsis: Granddad loves Siri on his new iPhone. Unfortunately, she loves him back ... a little too much.
episodes.title: I Dream of Siri

episodes.synopsis: After a fight with Granddad goes viral, Stinkmeaner turns into a celebrity, and Granddad's hate may cause him to be yet another clone of Stinkmeaner.
episodes.title: Stinkmeaner: Begun the Clone War Has

episodes.synopsis: Riley becomes the maligned target of gay rights groups after he calls his classmate "gay."
episodes.title: The New Black
